sentences.en: AIDS is an acronym for " Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome. "
sentences.cn: 艾滋病的全称是 “ 获得性免疫缺损综合征 ”.

sentences.en: AIDS is an acronym for "Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome".
sentences.cn: AIDS是“获得性免疫缺损综合症“的首字母缩略词。

sentences.en: Al is considered to be one of the first high profile commercial artists and his initials are also conveniently the acronym of the club.
sentences.cn: 铝被认为是第一个高调的商业艺术家之一，他的首字母是那么方便了俱乐部的首字母缩写。

sentences.en: ASDIC is an acronym for antisubmarine detection investigation committee.
sentences.cn: “ASDIC”是“反潜艇侦查调查委员会”的缩写形式.

sentences.en: Behind the word is acronym for the name of the company, for example, " DR Changhong. "
sentences.cn: 后面两个字是公司名称的缩写, 例如 “ DR长虹 ”.

sentences.en: Every new acronym I hear turns out to be another dirty trick designed to allow rich countries to go on with business as usual.
sentences.cn: 我所听到的每个新缩写词原来都是另一个鬼把戏，旨在允许富裕国家照常进行一切活动。

sentences.en: Many examples below talk about SNMP which is an acronym for Simple Network Management Protocol.
sentences.cn: 下面的许多例子是关于SNMP的,SNMP是简单网络过来协议的缩写.

sentences.en: Sample for advanced automatic substitution of numbers, measurements, date, acronym, etc.
sentences.cn: 数字 、 尺寸 、 日期 、 缩略词等的高级自动替换举例.

sentences.en: Shanghai's acronym, originated from an ancient coastal fishing tools.
sentences.cn: 上海市的简称, 起源于古代沿海一种捕鱼工具.

sentences.en: SoHo an acronym for South of Houston Street, is New York City's artistic heaven.
sentences.cn: 苏荷,即SouthofHoustonStreet之英文缩写, 是纽约市的艺术天堂.

sentences.en: Sonar is an acronym for sound navigation ranging.
sentences.cn: “sonar”(声纳)是“soundnavigationandranging”(声音导航和测距)的首字母缩写词.

sentences.en: SOS is the international Morse code signal rescuers, the acronym is not any word.
sentences.cn: 但其实,S. O. S. 是国际摩斯电码救难信号, 并非任何单字的缩写.

sentences.en: The name is not an acronym.
sentences.cn: 此称呼不是只取首字母的缩写词.

sentences.en: The robot fighter has been christened Swords acronym for Special Weapons Observation Reconnaissance Detection Systems.
sentences.cn: 这种机器人战士被命名为战剑,它的全名是特种武器观测侦察探测系统.

sentences.en: The study explores ways to promote so called acronym for science, technology, engineering and mathmaticsmathematics.
sentences.cn: 该报告探索了推广所谓顶尖学科(即科学, 技术, 工程,数学)的几种方式.

sentences.en: This prompted me to look for the earliest example an acronym.
sentences.cn: 这又促使我去寻找英语中最早出现的缩略语.

trans.tran_en: a word made up from the first letters of the name of something such as an organization. For example, NATO is an acronym for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization.
